PT_GOALS_UPDATES.name: PT_GOALS_UPDATES
PT_GOALS_UPDATES.description: This table contains data for the Discrete Goals (IGO) masterfile that is over-time data.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user (EMP) ID of the person who entered this data.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: Patient CSN (contact serial number I.E. unique contact identifier) associated with a particular IGO (goal) contact.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Current status of the goal record

columns.name: INSTNT_OF_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of edit for this contact.

columns.name: PT_STATED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not a goal is patient-stated.
